title: cygan

content: today i'm raffling off a brand new german Bitcoin magazineEinundzwanzigthe magazine has a print run of 2100 copies and there are currently 377 left in stock.rules:choose a number between 0-fusers with the rank 'newbies' are excluded from the free rafflethe raffle starts when all numbers have been selected and i have chosen a blockfreeshipping worldwide - the magazine shipped from eu1 - DirtyBirdE2 - Kryptowerk3 - sunnybwoy4 - PeakDK5 - salad daging6 - Mauser7 - Bullion-n-BTC8 - andulolika9 - The_Crypto_Kid0 - haloxona - Suzuki Mattb - QuakerBullc - MoparMiningLLCd - Dernostee - montreal1f - JanEmil
